channel.title: [Help] Developing a combat base

item.title: [Help] Developing a combat base
item.dc:creator: @Epic_One Epic One
item.description:
@Epic_One wrote:

Hello, I’m working off a Blank Base (Untouched), I’ve done alot of work with it, but now I’m attempting to add Combat (Malee) I will write Handlers for Magic + Range.

I’ve been trying to modify an existing base (Pimpscape) To no avail;

So, What I’m asking for is if someone can give me a “Bare” Base, that compiles fine. but doesn’t have to much - So I can modify it properly to fit my needs, so just the “FrameWork” of a combat base.

If anyone has a blank source and has written a framework for it, I’d be grateful for it. Also I can understand posting a framework - And having people leach it would be annoying. So if you would like to Pm me an upload link or the code that`d be fine aswell.

Like I said, Just the basics. I really do not want a full combat code, as I prefer to do some stuff myself, or else I`ll learn absolutly nothing. I’d like to be able to see what it does and how it does it. So a full base would’nt help me.

If you can help me, I appreciate it. If you can`t but know a tutorial / persons that can. Please post a method of getting ahold of such person, or a link to the tutorial.

If you do not understand what I am asking for, please do not post as it increases spam. Simply Pm me.

     Many Thanks,
           Epic One, (Founder Crystal Pro FX) - Mark LeBlanc.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2008, 01:51:18 PM[/size][hr]case 72:
if (attackNpc > 0)
	{
		message ("You are already under attack.");
	} else {
		attackNpc = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
				server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].StartKilling = playerId;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].RandomWalk = false;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsUnderAttack = true;
			}
	break;

Read full topic
